mapper.insert: insert into carrer_info values( career_code_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, nvl(#{job_position, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{job_rank, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{corporate_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{corp_local, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{join_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{resign_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{contents, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{corp_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null) )
